caption.p: Mean changes (relative to the control-run climatology) for year 131–150. a from the 1% CO 2 run and b from the FixedIce run. Shown are changes in December sea-ice concentration (SIC, %, color shading), surface air temperature (Tas. °C, red contours, interval = 2), and surface latent plus sensible heat flux ((LH + SH, W m −2, yellow contours, interval = 10, positive upward). Dashed contours are for negative values. The spatial pattern correlations are: r (SIC, Tas) = −0.20, r (SIC, LH + SH) = −0.75, and r (Tas, LH + SH) = 0.55 in a, and r (SIC, Tas) = 0.12, r (SIC,LH + SH) = −0.45, and r (Tas, LH + SH) = −0.28 in b. These correlations have a P-value below 0.01
